instructions: Sign in to your Play Console . On the left menu, click Settings > Payment Settings > Manage sales tax . Under "European Union," click Show .
Sign in to your Play Console . On the left menu, click Settings > Payment Settings > Manage sales tax .

Sign in to your Play Console . On the left menu, click Settings > Payment Settings > Manage sales tax . Find the region where you'd like to change tax settings. Next to "Tax rates," select the pencil icon . Enter the tax rate. Click Save.
